entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.

Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low.
